description: Base risk patterns for contract review
author: claude-office-skills

unlimited_liability.name: Unlimited Liability
unlimited_liability.description: Contract may expose party to unlimited financial liability
unlimited_liability.description_zh: 合同可能使一方承担无限的经济责任
unlimited_liability.recommendation: Add liability cap (e.g., 12 months of fees or contract value)
unlimited_liability.recommendation_zh: 添加责任上限（如12个月费用或合同金额）

unfair_termination.name: Unfair Termination
unfair_termination.description: Termination clauses may be one-sided or unfair
unfair_termination.description_zh: 终止条款可能是单方面的或不公平的
unfair_termination.recommendation: Ensure mutual termination rights with reasonable notice period
unfair_termination.recommendation_zh: 确保双方都有终止权，并有合理的通知期

broad_ip_assignment.name: Broad IP Assignment
broad_ip_assignment.description: Intellectual property rights may be transferred without adequate protection
broad_ip_assignment.description_zh: 知识产权可能在没有充分保护的情况下被转让
broad_ip_assignment.recommendation: Exclude pre-existing IP and clearly define scope of assignment
broad_ip_assignment.recommendation_zh: 排除已有知识产权，明确转让范围

perpetual_confidentiality.name: Perpetual Confidentiality
perpetual_confidentiality.description: Confidentiality obligations may be overly broad or perpetual
perpetual_confidentiality.description_zh: 保密义务可能过于宽泛或永久

one_sided_indemnification.name: One-Sided Indemnification
one_sided_indemnification.recommendation: Ensure mutual indemnification and reasonable scope limitations
one_sided_indemnification.recommendation_zh: 确保相互赔偿，并有合理的范围限制

mandatory_arbitration.name: Mandatory Arbitration
mandatory_arbitration.description: Disputes must be resolved through arbitration
mandatory_arbitration.description_zh: 争议必须通过仲裁解决
mandatory_arbitration.recommendation: Consider if arbitration is appropriate; ensure fair arbitrator selection
mandatory_arbitration.recommendation_zh: 考虑仲裁是否合适；确保仲裁员选择公平

excessive_noncompete.name: Excessive Non-Compete
excessive_noncompete.description: Non-compete clause may be overly restrictive
excessive_noncompete.description_zh: 竞业限制条款可能过于严格
excessive_noncompete.recommendation: Limit duration (1-2 years max), geographic scope
excessive_noncompete.recommendation_zh: 限制期限（最长1-2年）、地域范围

auto_renewal.name: Auto-Renewal
auto_renewal.description: Contract may automatically renew without explicit consent
auto_renewal.recommendation_zh: 确保有明确的退出程序
